Event.name: Cause_to_be_sharp
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or Cause makes a <fen>Patient</fen> sharper or duller. An <fen>Instrument</fen> or <fen>Means</fen> may be mentioned.
<ex><fex name="Agent">John</fex> is in the basement <t>sharpening</t> <fex name="Patient">his axe</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the sharpening (or dulling) action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to become more or less sharp. <ex><fex name="Agent">The smith</fex> <t>sharpened</t> many knives in the days before the war.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity directed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that interacts with an <fen>Patient</fen>, causing it to change in sharpness. <ex>Never <t>sharpen</t> your knives <fex name="Ins">with my whetstone</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> sharpens the <fen>Patient</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> sharpens the <fen>Patient</fen>. <ex>George <t>sharpened</t> the bayonet <fex name="Purpose">to please the sergeant</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> sharpens <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Patient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that is sharpened. <ex>Several cuts into the log had <t>dulled</t> <fex name="Patient">the blade</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner in which the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the sharpness of the <fen>Patient</fen>. <ex>He <t>sharpened</t> the knife <fex name="Mnr">silently</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is responding to by executing the sharpening act. </def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Patient</fen>'s sharpness is affected by the <fen>Agent</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces the state of sharpness. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s. <ex><fex name="Cause">The relentless impacts against the wood</fex> gradually <t>blunted</t> the edge of this axe.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The resulting configuration of the <fen>Patient</fen>.
<ex><t>Sharpen</t> this knife <fex name="Result">to a nice point</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: dull.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make or cause to become less sharp.

lexUnit.name: blunt.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make or cause to be less sharp.
